description:
Austin Wilde is on his way over to his homie's house to go to the big game on campus, but it turns out his friend has left, and the only one at home his his friend's little brother, Mike King. Mike has had his eye on Austin for quite some time, so when his brother steps out for a while, Mike sees it as the perfect opportunity to seduce him once and for all. Now anyone who knows Austin knows he is down to pound the mound, so when he walks in on Mike stroking his rock hard dick, interrupting is the furthest thing from his mind. Before you know it, the two of them helping each other pass the time by fucking, sucking and whatever else comes to their perverted minds.

Enjoy!
title: Brother's Keeper
